abstract: Maxwell L. Anderson, who has been director of the Indianapolis Museum of Art since 2006, has been named director of the Dallas Museum of Art.
snippet: Maxwell L. Anderson, who has been director of the Indianapolis Museum of Art since 2006, has been named director of the Dallas Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: Maxwell L. Anderson, who has been director of the Indianapolis Museum of Art since 2006, has been named director of the Dallas Museum of Art. He succeeds Bonnie Pitman, who retired from the job in June.

headline.main: A New Director for Dallas Museum of Art
